fixes.name: term Bucket
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted nested CASE/IF logic into a DAX measure. Used WEEKDAY(td) to evaluate weekday. Replaced Tableau DATEADD week/day/month with direct day arithmetic (td + n) and EDATE(td,1) for adding one month. Replaced parameter reference [Parameters].[Holidays] with SELECTEDVALUE('Holidays'[Display As]). All column references were rewritten to the 'Table'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The original Tableau formula references a parameter ([Parameters].[Holidays]); per rules, any calculation that references parameters must be created as a measure.
